data "Properties" "IsToggled;ToggledDefaultOn;ToggledDefaultAddToHotbar"
data "DisplayName" "hea065210g624fg45d9g8ebdg9f8207a30f01"
data "Description" "hdf6a6b78g30b4g4cb9gb427g9268768e289f"
data "Icon" "Spell_Evocation_ShockingGrasp"
data "Conditions" "SpellId('Target_MAG_ShockingGrasp_Staff') and HasStatus('QUICKENED_SHOCKING_GRASP_AVAILABLE', context.Source)"
data "StatsFunctors" "RemoveStatus(QUICKENED_SHOCKING_GRASP_AVAILABLE)"
data "ToggleOnFunctors" "ApplyStatus(QUICKENED_SHOCKING_GRASP_ON, 100, -1)"
data "ToggleOffFunctors" "RemoveStatus(QUICKENED_SHOCKING_GRASP_ON)"
data "ToggleOffContext" ""
data "BoostContext" "OnStatusApply;OnStatusRemove;OnEquip;OnCreate;OnInventoryChanged"
data "Boosts" "UnlockSpellVariant(SpellId('Target_MAG_ShockingGrasp_Staff'), ModifyTooltipDescription(), ModifyUseCosts(Replace,BonusActionPoint,1,0,ActionPoint))"
data "BoostConditions" "HasStatus('QUICKENED_SHOCKING_GRASP_AVAILABLE',context.Source)"

new entry "QuickenedShockingGrasp_Trigger"
type "PassiveData"
data "Properties" "OncePerCombat;IsHidden"
data "DisplayName" "hea065210g624fg45d9g8ebdg9f8207a30f01"
data "Description" "hdf6a6b78g30b4g4cb9gb427g9268768e289f"
data "Icon" "Spell_Evocation_ShockingGrasp"
data "StatsFunctorContext" "OnTurn"
data "Conditions" "Combat()"
data "StatsFunctors" "ApplyStatus(QUICKENED_SHOCKING_GRASP_AVAILABLE,100,-1)"

new entry "QUICKENED_SHOCKING_GRASP_ON"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "DisplayName" "hea065210g624fg45d9g8ebdg9f8207a30f01"
data "Description" "hdf6a6b78g30b4g4cb9gb427g9268768e289f"
data "Icon" "Spell_Evocation_ShockingGrasp"
data "StackId" "QUICKENED_SHOCKING_GRASP_ON"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting;ApplyToDead"

new entry "QUICKENED_SHOCKING_GRASP_AVAILABLE"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "DisplayName" "hea065210g624fg45d9g8ebdg9f8207a30f01"
data "Description" "hdf6a6b78g30b4g4cb9gb427g9268768e289f"
data "Icon" "Spell_Evocation_ShockingGrasp"
data "StackId" "QUICKENED_SHOCKING_GRASP_AVAILABLE"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnCombatEnded"
data "RemoveConditions" "not Combat()"

new entry "Target_MAG_ShockingGrasp_Staff"
type "SpellData"
data "SpellType" "Target"
using "Target_ShockingGrasp"


new entry "QUICKENED_VICIOUS_MOCKERY"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "DisplayName" "hda2044a5g2eb1g4ee4gb2bag25bd6dab97d4"
data "StackId" "QUICKENED_VICIOUS_MOCKERY"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting;ApplyToDead"
data "Passives" "QuickenedViciousMockery_Toggle;QuickenedViciousMockery_Trigger"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "RemoveStatus(QUICKENED_VICIOUS_MOCKERY_ON)"

new entry "QuickenedViciousMockery_Toggle"
type "PassiveData"
using "MAG_Warlock_Quickened_Cantrips_Passive"
data "Properties" "IsToggled;ToggledDefaultOn;ToggledDefaultAddToHotbar"
data "DisplayName" "hda2044a5g2eb1g4ee4gb2bag25bd6dab97d4"
data "Description" "h6410cd2bg25b1g4982ga8b3ga606e7456c9a"
data "Icon" "Spell_Enchantment_ViciousMockery"
data "Conditions" "SpellId('Target_MAG_ViciousMockery_Staff') and HasStatus('QUICKENED_VICIOUS_MOCKERY_AVAILABLE', context.Source)"
data "StatsFunctors" "RemoveStatus(QUICKENED_VICIOUS_MOCKERY_AVAILABLE)"
data "ToggleOnFunctors" "ApplyStatus(QUICKENED_VICIOUS_MOCKERY_ON, 100, -1)"
data "ToggleOffFunctors" "RemoveStatus(QUICKENED_VICIOUS_MOCKERY_ON)"
data "ToggleOffContext" ""
data "BoostContext" "OnStatusApply;OnStatusRemove;OnEquip;OnCreate;OnInventoryChanged"
data "Boosts" "UnlockSpellVariant(SpellId('Target_MAG_ViciousMockery_Staff'), ModifyTooltipDescription(), ModifyUseCosts(Replace,BonusActionPoint,1,0,ActionPoint))"
data "BoostConditions" "HasStatus('QUICKENED_VICIOUS_MOCKERY_AVAILABLE',context.Source)"
